title: Unable to connect to the authentication service

embed.description: Image OCE Unable to connect hosted in imgbb.com

body:
When I tried to log in I got error message "Unknown error". I thought maybe new client got corrupted and deleted "Riot Client" folder to redownload it. But when I tried to log in with old client it gave me more details about the error. I also tried repairing it, but it didn't work either.

EDIT: Looks like it was server issue and already is resolved.
